events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking status hasn't updated in days, and I'm really concerned about the delay.
The customer reported a significant delay in delivery with no recent tracking updates; assigning to Delivery Delay cluster.
A customer support agent has been assigned to investigate the delivery delay issue reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your package hasn't arrived yet, and I'm here to help you figure out what's causing the delay.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have so I can look into the status of your shipment?
Sure, my order number is 57483920, and the tracking number is 1Z999AA10123456784. The last update was over a week ago.
Thank you for the details. We’ve contacted the courier service to expedite your shipment and expect an updated delivery estimate within 48 hours. I’ll keep monitoring and update you promptly.
I appreciate you following up so quickly and taking action. I look forward to your update and hope the package arrives soon.
Good news! The courier confirmed your package is out for delivery today. Please let us know if you encounter any further issues.
Just checking in to confirm you received your order and everything arrived as expected. We're here if you need any more assistance.
Since your delivery issue appears resolved and no further concerns were raised, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience.
